content:
The Façade tab contains the publicly visible information about the character or creature.  You can think of this as the information that would be avaialble to a casual observer.  The tab contains a picture as well as descriptive text.

When considering what text or picture to include, consider what information a casual observer would be able to discerne.  Gross physical characteristics, obvious physical or behavioral traits, and any other aspects of the character or creature are appropriate.  Depending on the character, some of the information in this public description may be misleading or even false.

If a player has only limited access to the character or creature, then this Façade tab will be the only tab visible to them.

Descriptions of biographical information, personality, character history, or other private information belong on the @JournalEntry[6HtyeakXK8cSTXvO]{Sheet - Profile Tab}
